mapper.insert: insert into HTY_FCT_INVENTORY_TURNS_ORG (STAT_DAY, ORG_CODE, ORG_FNAME, PROD_CODE, PROD_FNAME, PL_CODE_LV1, PL_NAME_LV1, PL_CODE_LV2, PL_NAME_LV2, PL_CODE_LV3, PL_NAME_LV3, PP_CODE, PP_NAME, STOCK_NUM_TRUE, STOCK_AMT, LOSS_AMT, SHELVES_DATE, TURN_DAYS, STOCK_NUM, SHELVES_FLAG, SALE_AMT_MON, SALE_QVT_MON, SALE_AMT_LMON, SALE_QVT_LMON, SALE_AVG) values (#{statDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgFname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodFname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plCodeLv1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plNameLv1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plCodeLv2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plNameLv2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plCodeLv3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plNameLv3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockNumTrue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lossAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shelvesDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{turnDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shelvesFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleAmtMon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleQvtMon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleAmtLmon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleQvtLmon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saleAvg,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
